entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 5:56AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Another Round of Snow Saturday and Sunday... Snow is expected from this evening through Sunday night for the Southeast Interior, including the White Mountains, the Fairbanks area, and the Alaska Range. General snow totals of around 2 to 4 inches are expected, with the higher amounts toward and in the Alaska Range and lower amounts for the Interior. Blustery
